TopicTitle: [0.17] Kosmos Spacecraft Design Bureau - 0.17 LK parts released

Articles.Content: the old mod pack parts for kosmos still work
what new parts are you planning to add in the future releases?

I noticed a few bugs when running MechLab and PowerTech. Seems that the animation for 2 of the retro engines don't shutoff, but they stop producing thrust. Not sure if it's a compatibility problem or not.

With the possible exception of the now defunct IFE pack, KOSMOS was definitely my favorite pack purely for travel and exploration--that's before trying anything involving space stations! Given that it is still a three person command module I hope things are scaled up (since we know how big kerbalnauts are), but whatever the case, I'm just happy to see it updated.

EDIT: Hurray, resized! I am super excited for Angara engines and nuclear engines, whenever you realse them.

Edited August 16, 2012 by Synthesis
great job can't wait to see the rest of the parts get a 0.16 upgrade.

thanks guys.

Pretty sure Normak is Doing that. major re balancing and the like. I thought it would be useful to release the VA for you all. Enjoy

I noticed a few bugs when running MechJeb and PowerTech. Seems that the animation for 2 of the retro engines don't shutoff, but they stop producing thrust. Not sure if it's a compatibility problem or not.

Same issue here.
I in no way make plugins. R4m0n says it is powertechs fault.
It would be nice if you could resize the other packs as well

I seem to be having some trouble with this mod. Apparently, the majority of those cool parts don't show up in my game.

EDIT: Nevermind, I think I've found the problem now.

Edited August 17, 2012 by Felsmak
Aaand Kosmos is back ladies and gentlemen! Thanks for your hard work! looking forward to the rest of the parts!
So, it is updated?

Same issue here.

Me too...it was hard to tell, but I guess the thrust isn't actually produced, just two of the nozzles keep firing. I'm sure it'll be ironed out eventually.

Hi everyone. Things are moving along, albeit slowly. I posted an absolutely scathing critique of the work we've done so far on the Facepunch boards about two weeks ago, and like Cardboard was just saying, I'm rebalancing the pack and trying to fix problems that have been persistent for months. Hopefully things will start to come together soon.

Ihave no idea how animated solar panels can affect engine fx. Especially if they aren't recharging the tank. If anybody pinpoints exact point of interaction it may be posible to do something with this. Until then I think it's muMech bug.
Good to have the VA back.

Does anyone know how to make the Kosmos Short/Long Solar Panels that fold out with an animation work with ZoxyGene? Also does anyone know how to make the animation actually work because it doesn't in 0.16.
works or me, do you have the correct version of mechjeb??

Great to have the VA! Love this parts pack, probably my favorite. Can't wait for the rest to get updated.

Thank you!

ZR
hey i have been looking for a good set of solar panals for a while now. here they are. but there is no mac plugin..... so....

What the problem with the plugin?

If it still doesn't work for you, check debug console or post here the output log. Maybe we'll find the answer this way
This add-on is fantastic. Couldn't ask for more from it

is possible using this parts to make a MIR?

but still I lack the MIR.
